content: प्रतिबद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Bound, tied, fastened to. {@--2@} Connected with, {@--3@} Hindered, obstructed, impeded. {@--4@} Set, inlaid. {@--5@} Furnished with, possessing. {@--6@} Entangled, involved. {@--7@} Kept at a distance. {@--8@} Disappointed. {@--9@} Fixed, directed. {@--10@} Attached or hanging to. {@--11@} Excluded, cut off. {@--12@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) Invariably and inseparably connected and implied (as fire in smoke).
